text:
@realDonaldTrump As president you should be learning about, oh, I dunno, pandemics instead of looking at useless statistics like ratings & advertising dollars.
Let me help. Here’s a link from CDC that teaches how to make a damn BANDANA MASK because we don’t have better! https://t.co/kMbvi12pGz
